result.reason: Users with large AD-imported trees need search to find connections inside collapsed folders without manually expanding all nodes first
result.approach: Ensure the TreeListView filter traverses all children recursively (even collapsed branches) when filtering. The ObjectListView TreeListView already walks the model tree for filtering — verify CanExpandGetter and the model enumeration include collapsed nodes. If not, override the filtering to flatten and search all descendants, then show matching items with their parent chain expanded.

attempts.raw_output:
Now I have enough context. The issue requests that the search/filter in the connection tree should search across **all nodes recursively** (including inside collapsed/unexpanded folders), not just visible/expanded ones. This is a feature enhancement for the ObjectListView-based tree.
